title: Account Settings display multiple sections: Name, Email addresses, Password, Phone number, Date of birth
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN The user views "Account Settings"
custom_expected:
THEN The user should see the following sections:
- Name
- Email addresses
- Password
- Phone number
- Date of birth
AND The user should see their email address displayed under the "Change" link for the Email addresses section
AND The user should see their date of birth displayed under the "Change" link for the Date of birth section

title: Account Settings Anchor tag (name)
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN The user goes to https://[env].mlb.com/account/account-settings#name

For DEV, [env]=dev-gcp
For QA, [env]=qa-gcp
For BETA, [env]=beta-gcp
For PROD, [env]=www
custom_expected: THEN The user is taken directly to the Name section in Account Settings

title: Account Settings Anchor tag (email)
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN The user goes to https://[env].mlb.com/account/account-settings#email

For DEV, [env]=dev-gcp
For QA, [env]=qa-gcp
For BETA, [env]=beta-gcp
For PROD, [env]=www
custom_expected: THEN The user is taken directly to the Email addresses section in Account Settings

custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN The user goes to https://[env].mlb.com/account/account-settings#password

For DEV, [env]=dev-gcp
For QA, [env]=qa-gcp
For BETA, [env]=beta-gcp
For PROD, [env]=www
custom_expected: THEN The user is taken directly to the Password section in Account Settings

custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN The user goes to https://[env].mlb.com/account/account-settings#phone

For DEV, [env]=dev-gcp
For QA, [env]=qa-gcp
For BETA, [env]=beta-gcp
For PROD, [env]=www
custom_expected: THEN The user is taken directly to the Phone number section in Account Settings

title: Account Settings Anchor tag (dob)
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN The user goes to https://[env].mlb.com/account/account-settings#dob

For DEV, [env]=dev-gcp
For QA, [env]=qa-gcp
For BETA, [env]=beta-gcp
For PROD, [env]=www
custom_expected: THEN The user is taken directly to the Date of birth section in Account Settings

title: Account Settings - Expand Name section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the "Change" link for the Name section or clicks on the row's header
custom_expected:
THEN The following fields should display:
- First Name
- Last Name
- Username
AND The "Change" link text should update to "Close"

title: Account Settings - Expand Email address section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the "Change" link for the Email address section or clicks on the row's header
custom_expected:
THEN The following field should display:
- Email Address
AND The "Change" link text should update to "Close"

title: Account Settings - Expand Password section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the "Change" link for the Password section or clicks on the row's header
custom_expected:
THEN The following fields should display:
- Current password
- New password
- Re-type new password
AND The "New password" and "Re-type new password" fields are disabled
AND Below the "Re-type new password" field, a "Forgot Password" link should display
AND The "Change" link text should update to "Close"

title: Account Settings - Expand Phone number section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the "Change" link for the Phone number section or clicks on the row's header
custom_expected:
THEN The following field should display:
- Primary phone number
AND The "Change" link text should update to "Close"

title: Account Settings - Expand Date of birth section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the "Change" link for the Date of birth section or clicks on the row's header
custom_expected:
THEN The following fields should display:
- Month
- Day
- Year
AND The "Change" link text should update to "Close"

title: Save button should be disabled and Cancel button should be enabled when user visits the Account Settings sections without making changes (default state)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user first visits the "Account Settings" page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user expands each section:
- Name
- Email addresses
- Password
- Phone number
- Date of birth
custom_expected: THEN Save button should be disabled and the Cancel button should be enabled

title: Name, Email Address, Password, Phone Number, Date of Birth sections -  When change is successfully changed, a green notification bar appears at the bottom of the browser window
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user successfully saves changes to the Name, Email Address, Password, Phone Number, or Date of Birth sections
custom_expected: THEN A green notification bar appears at the bottom of the browser window with the message: Account saved successfully!

title: First Name validation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Name section
custom_steps: WHEN The user enters  a numeric value into the First Name input field
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button is disabled
AND The message "Please provide a valid first name" is displayed in red

title: Last Name validation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Name section
custom_steps: WHEN The user enters a numeric value into the Last Name input field
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button is disabled
AND The message "Please provide a valid last name" is displayed in red

title: Username validation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Name section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters an invalid username in the Username field

Valid Username Requirements:
- 6-15 characters
- Only letters and numbers
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button is disabled
AND The message "Please provide a valid username" is displayed in red

title: Username tooltip displays when the Username field is selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Name section
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks on the Username field
custom_expected:
THEN A tooltip message displays that states the requirements for a valid username:

Username Requirements
Must be 6 - 15 characters
Letters and number only

title: User can save changes to their First Name, Last Name, and Username
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user makes changes to their First Name, Last Name, and Username
custom_expected:
THEN The changes are reflected under the "Close" link for the Name section
AND The Save button should be enabled
AND The user should be able to click the Save button
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "Account Settings" page

title: Clicking Cancel reverts any changes in the Name section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expands the Name section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user makes changes to their First Name, Last Name, and Username
AND The user clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN The changes are reverted
AND The Save button is disabled
AND The section closes/collapses

title: User can change their email address
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Email addresses section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user deletes their current email
AND The user enters a different valid email address
AND The user clicks Save
custom_expected:
THEN The new email displays in the Email addresses section of the "Account Settings" page
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "Account Settings" page

title: Clicking Cancel reverts any changes in the Email addresses section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expands the Email addresses section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user makes changes to their email address
AND The user clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN The changes are reverted
AND The Save button is disabled
AND The section closes/collapses

title: Error when changing email address to an email address already associated with an account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Email addresses section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user deletes their current email
AND The user enters an email address that is already associated with a different MLB.com account
AND The user clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN A red bar appears on bottom of browser window with the message: Cannot update email, there already exists a user with the email "[email address]"

title: State of input fields and buttons after entering any Current Password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps: WHEN The user starts typing in the "Current password" field
custom_expected:
THEN The "New password" field is enabled
AND The "Re-type new password" field is still disabled
AND The "Save" button is still disabled
AND The "Cancel" button is still enabled

title: State of input fields and buttons after entering any Current Password and New Password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters their current password in the "Current password" field
AND The user enters a valid password in the "New password" field

Valid Password Requirements:
- Must be 8-15 characters
- One uppercase letter
- One lowercase letter
- One number
custom_expected:
THEN The "New password" field displays a green checkmark
AND The "Re-type new password" field is enabled
AND The "Save" button is still disabled
AND The "Cancel" button is still enabled

title: Password tooltip displays when the "New password" field is selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters their current password in the "Current password" field
AND The user selects the "New password" field
custom_expected:
THEN A tooltip message displays that states the requirements for a valid password:

Password Requirements:
Must be 8 - 15 characters
One uppercase letter
One lowercase letter
One number

title: Password tooltip does not display when the "Re-type new password" field is selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters their current password in the "Current password" field
AND The user enters a new password in the "New password" field
AND The user selects the "Re-type new password" field
custom_expected: THEN A tooltip message does not display

title: Clicking Cancel reverts any changes in the Password section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expands the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters text in some or all of the following fields: Current password, New password, Re-type password
AND The user clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN The changes are reverted
AND The Save button is disabled
AND The section closes/collapses

title: After changing their password, user can login with new password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters their current password in the "Current password" field
AND The user enters a new valid password in the "New password" field
AND The user enters the same new valid password in the  "Re-type new password" field
AND The user clicks Save
AND The user logs out
AND The user goes to the login page
custom_expected: THEN The user should be able to login successfully with the new password

title: After changing their password, user cannot login with old password
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters their current password in the "Current password" field
AND The user enters a new valid password in the "New password" field
AND The user enters the same new valid password in the "Re-type new password" field
AND The user clicks Save
AND The user logs out
AND The user goes to the login page
custom_expected:
THEN The user should not be able to login with the old password
AND The error message "Authentication Error. Please check email and/or password and try again." should display

title: Clicking the Forgot Password link brings a user to the forgot password flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the Forgot Password link
custom_expected:
THEN The user is taken to the forgot password flow: https://[env].mlb.com/forgot-password

For DEV, [env]=dev-gcp
For QA, [env]=qa-gcp
For BETA, [env]=beta-gcp
For PROD, [env]=www

title: User receives "MLB Account Password Reset" email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks the Forgot Password link
AND On the /forgot-password page, the user enters their email address in the Email field
AND The user clicks the Reset Password button
custom_expected:
THEN The message "A password reset link has been sent to you via e-mail." is displayed
AND The user receives an email with the subject "MLB Account Password Reset" in the inbox of the email they provided

title: User can reset their password from the "MLB Account Password Reset" email
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
AND The user clicked the Forgot Password link
AND On the /forgot-password page, the user entered their email address in the Email field
AND The user clicked the Reset Password button
AND The user received an email with the subject "MLB Account Password Reset" in the inbox of the email they provided
custom_steps:
WHEN The user opens the "MLB Account Password Reset" email
AND The user clicks on the Reset Password button in the email
AND On the Reset your password page, the user fills out the New password and Repeat password fields
AND The user clicks the Reset Password button
custom_expected:
THEN The user is redirected to MLB.com's homepage
AND The user can login with their new password if they logout and try to log back in

title: "New password cannot be your current password" Error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user fills in the "Current password" field
AND The user enters a value in the "New password" field that matches the value entered in the "Current password" field
custom_expected: THEN A red error message "New password cannot be your current password" displays under the "New password" field

title: "New password does not match" Error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user fills in the "Current password" field
AND The user enters a new password in the "New password" field
AND The user enters a value in the "Re-type new password" field that does not match the value entered in the "New password" field
custom_expected: THEN A red error message "New password does not match" displays under the "Re-type new password" field

title: "Current Password is not correct" Error
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user fills in the "Current password" field with a value that does not match their current password
AND The user enters a new password in the "New password" field
AND The user enters a value in the "Re-type new password" field that matches the value entered in the "New password" field
AND The user clicks Save
custom_expected: THEN A red bar appears on bottom of browser window with the message: Current Password is not correct

title: Errors on "New password" field if requirements are not met
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Password section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user fills in the "Current password" field
AND The user enters a value in the "New password" field that that does not meet password requirements
custom_expected:
THEN A red error message displays under the "New password" field.  Only one error message will appear at a time.  The precedence of error messages is:
1. If the value is less than 8 or more than 15 characters, then the red error message is: Password must be 8 - 15 characters
2. If the value has no uppercase letters, then the red error message is: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
3. If the value has no lowercase letters, then the red error message is: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
4. If the value has no numbers, then the red error message is: Password must contain at least one number
5. If the value has spaces, then the red error message is: Password cannot contain spaces

title: Phone number validation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Phone number section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters an invalid phone number in the Primary phone number field

Valid Phone Number Requirements:
- If the number starts with a +: Minimum 8 (including the +), Maximum 16 characters (including the +)
- If the number doesn't start with a +: Minimum/Maximum 10 characters (not counting hyphens, which are accepted after the first 3 and second 3 characters ie. 555-555-5555)
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button is disabled
AND The message "Please provide a valid phone number" is displayed in red

title: If user has a phone number saved on their profile, "1 phone number" should display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user has a phone number saved on their profile
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND "1 phone number" displays under the Change link
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the "Change" link
custom_expected:
THEN The Primary phone number field displays with the user's saved phone number filled in
AND A "Remove" link displays

title: If user does not have a phone number saved on their profile, "No phone number" should display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user does not have a phone number saved on their profile
custom_steps: WHEN The user is views the "Account Settings" page
custom_expected: THEN "No phone number" displays under the Change/Close link in the Phone Number section

title: User can change their Phone number
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Phone number section
custom_steps: WHEN The user makes changes to their Phone number
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button should be enabled
AND The user should be able to click the Save button
AND The text under the "Close" link for the Phone number section should change to "1 phone number"
AND A "Remove" link should display
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "Account Settings" page

title: Clicking Cancel reverts any changes in the Phone number section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Phone number section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user makes changes to their Phone number
AND The user clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN The changes are reverted
AND The Save button is disabled
AND The section closes/collapses

title: User can remove their Phone number with the "Remove" link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user has a phone number saved on their profile
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Phone number section
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the "Remove" link
custom_expected:
THEN The phone number is removed from the profile and the "Primary phone number" field
AND The text under the "Close" link for the Phone number section should change to "No phone number"
AND A "Remove" link no longer displays
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "Account Settings" page

title: User is unable to enter a letter into the Primary phone number field
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Phone number section
custom_steps: WHEN The user tries to enter letters in the Primary phone number field
custom_expected: THEN The user is unable to enter letters in the Primary phone number field

title: Date of Birth validation - Month
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Date of birth section
custom_steps: WHEN The user enters an invalid value in the Month field (Valid Month values: 01-12)
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button is disabled
AND The message "Please provide a valid month" is displayed in red

title: Date of Birth validation - Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Date of birth section
custom_steps: WHEN The user enters an invalid value in the Day field (Valid Day values: 01-31 (validate against month, including leap years))
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button is disabled
AND The message "Please provide a valid day" is displayed in red

title: Date of Birth validation - Year
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Date of birth section
custom_steps: WHEN The user enters an invalid value in the Year field (Valid Year values: 4 digits and Any year equal to or after 1900)
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button is disabled
AND The message "Please provide a valid year" is displayed in red

title: Date of Birth validation - Must be at least 13 years of age
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Date of birth section
custom_steps: WHEN The user enters a birth date/age below 13 years old (example: 04/15/2019)
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button is disabled
AND The message "Must be at least 13 years of age" is displayed in red

title: User can change their Date of Birth
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Date of birth section
custom_steps: WHEN The user makes changes to their Date of Birth
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button should be enabled
AND The user should be able to click the Save button
AND The changes are reflected under the "Close" link for the Date of Birth section
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "Account Settings" page

title: Clicking Cancel reverts any changes in the Date of Birth section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Account Settings" page
AND The user expanded the Date of birth section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user makes changes to their Date of Birth
AND The user clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN The changes are reverted
AND The Save button is disabled
AND The section closes/collapses

title: Favorite Team section displays all 30 teams (logo, city, name) and Favorite pill element
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the Favorite Team section
custom_expected:
THEN All 30 teams display with their city, name, and logo
AND The team name (not city) is bold
AND The pill element should default to grey but will turn blue when a team is select as the user's favorite
AND The pill element's text should be "FAVORITE"

30 teams:
Arizona Diamondbacks
Atlanta Braves
Baltimore Orioles
Boston Red Sox
Chicago Cubs
Chicago White Sox
Cincinnati Reds
Cleveland Indians
Colorado Rockies
Detroit Tigers
Houston Astros
Kansas City Royals
Los Angeles Angels
Los Angeles Dodgers
Miami Marlins
Milwaukee Brewers
Minnesota Twins
New York Mets
New York Yankees
Oakland Athletics
Philadelphia Phillies
Pittsburgh Pirates
San Diego Padres
San Francisco Giants
Seattle Mariners
St. Louis Cardinals
Tampa Bay Rays
Texas Rangers
Toronto Blue Jays
Washington Nationals

title: User can select a Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Favorite Team section
custom_steps: WHEN The user selects a team
custom_expected:
THEN The pill element should turn blue for the selected team
AND A star should display at the top right of the selected team's tile
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "My Teams and Players" page (Favorite Team section)

title: User can only select 1 Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Favorite Team section
AND The user has a previously saved favorite team
custom_steps: WHEN The user selects another team to be their favorite team
custom_expected:
THEN The previously saved favorite team is de-selected (The pill element for the team should turn grey, and the star should be removed from the team's tile)
AND The new favorite team is saved (The pill element for the team should turn blue, and a star should display at the top right of the team's tile)
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "My Teams and Players" page (Favorite Team section)

title: User can remove previously saved Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Favorite Team section
AND The user has a previously saved favorite team
custom_steps: WHEN The user selects their previously saved favorite team
custom_expected:
THEN The previously saved favorite team is de-selected (The pill element for the team should turn grey, and the star should be removed from the team's tile)
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "My Teams and Players" page (Favorite Team section)

title: Followed Teams section displays all 30 teams (logo, city, name) and Follow/Following pill element
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the Followed Team section
custom_expected:
THEN All 30 teams display with their city, name, and logo
AND The team name (not city) is bold
AND The pill element should default to grey but will turn blue when a team is select as a followed team
AND The pill element's text should default to "FOLLOW" but will update to "FOLLOWING" when a team is selected as a followed team

30 teams:
Arizona Diamondbacks
Atlanta Braves
Baltimore Orioles
Boston Red Sox
Chicago Cubs
Chicago White Sox
Cincinnati Reds
Cleveland Indians
Colorado Rockies
Detroit Tigers

Kansas City Royals
Los Angeles Angels
Los Angeles Dodgers
Miami Marlins
Milwaukee Brewers
Minnesota Twins
New York Mets
New York Yankees
Oakland Athletics
Philadelphia Phillies
Pittsburgh Pirates
San Diego Padres
San Francisco Giants
Seattle Mariners
St. Louis Cardinals
Tampa Bay Rays
Texas Rangers
Toronto Blue Jays
Washington Nationals

title: User can select Followed Team(s)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Teams section
custom_steps: WHEN The user selects a team or multiple teams
custom_expected:
THEN The pill element should turn blue for the selected team(s)
AND The pill element's text should update from "FOLLOW" to "FOLLOWING" for the selected team(s)
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "My Teams and Players" page (Followed Teams section)

title: User can remove previously saved Followed Team(s)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Teams section
AND The user has a previously saved followed team(s)
custom_steps: WHEN The user selects their previously saved followed team(s) to unfollow
custom_expected:
THEN The previously saved followed team is de-selected (The pill element for the team should turn grey, and the pill element's text should update from "FOLLOWING" to "FOLLOW")
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "My Teams and Players" page (Followed Team section)

title: Player tiles display image, name, and Follow/Following pill element
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user views the Followed Players section
AND The user searches for a player
custom_expected:
THEN Player tiles appear with an image and name (Note that the image may be a placeholder image if the player has no headshot available)
AND The pill element should default to grey but will turn blue when a team is select as a followed team
AND The pill element's text should default to "FOLLOW" but will update to "FOLLOWING" when a player is selected as a followed player

title: User can search for a player by team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Players section
AND The Search Players input field is empty
custom_steps: WHEN The user selects a team from the dropdown
custom_expected: THEN Only players on the team's active roster are displayed

title: User can search for a player by name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Players section
AND The Select a team dropdown is empty
custom_steps: WHEN The user starts typing in the Search Players field
custom_expected:
THEN Player tiles appear
AND Player search results update on keystroke

title: User can search for a player by name and team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Players section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters text in the Search players field
AND The user selects a team from the dropdown
custom_expected: THEN Player search results appear based on the text entered in the Search players field and the team selected in the dropdown

title: Typing in the Search players field clears the Select a team dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Players section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user selects a team from the Select a team dropdown
AND The user types into the Search players field
custom_expected:
THEN The selected team from the Select a team dropdown clears out
AND Search results update

title: User can clear the Search players field
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Players section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters text in the Search players field
AND The user clicks the "x" at the right of the Search players field
custom_expected:
THEN The Search players field clears
AND Search results update

title: User can clear the Select a team dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Players section
custom_steps:
WHEN The user selects a team from the Select a team dropdown
AND The user clicks the "x" at the right of the Select a team dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN The Select a team dropdown clears
AND Search results update

title: User can select Followed Player(s)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Players section
custom_steps: WHEN The user selects a player or multiple players
custom_expected:
THEN The pill element should turn blue for the selected player(s)
AND The pill element's text should update from "FOLLOW" to "FOLLOWING" for the selected player(s)
AND The followed player(s) stay where they are on the page (they are not re-sorted) until the search filters changes or the page is refreshed
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "My Teams and Players" page (Followed Players section)

title: User can remove previously saved Followed Player(s)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Players section
AND The user has a previously saved followed player(s)
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks their previously saved followed player(s) to unfollow
custom_expected:
THEN The previously saved followed player is de-selected (The pill element for the team should turn grey, and the pill element's text should update from "FOLLOWING" to "FOLLOW")
AND The previously followed player stay where they are on the page (they are not re-sorted) until the search filters changes or the page is refreshed
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "My Teams and Players" page (Followed Players section)

title: On page load, user can see their followed players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user has a previously saved followed player(s)
custom_steps: WHEN The user is views the Followed Players section on the "My Teams and Players" page
custom_expected: THEN The user's followed players display

title: Recently Followed/Unfollowed Player(s) are re-sorted after search filter changes
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "My Teams and Players" page
AND The user is viewing the Followed Players section
AND The user has a previously saved followed player(s)
custom_steps:
WHEN The user enters search filters (using search players input field and/or select a team dropdown)
AND The user follows player(s)
AND The user unfollows player(s)
AND The user changes their search filters
custom_expected:
THEN The followed/unfollowed players are re-sorted:
- Followed players move to the top of the players list/grid (Followed players are sorted alphabetically by first name)
- Unfollowed players no longer appear (unless they are part of the active filter, in which case they are sorted accordingly)

title: When "Add to card" is clicked, credit card fields, Save button, and Cancel button should display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Manage Subscriptions" page
AND The user expanded the Payment methods section
AND The user have less than 5 payment methods saved
custom_steps: WHEN The user clicks the "Add a card" link
custom_expected:
THEN The following fields should display:
Credit card number
Credit card type logos (MasterCard, Visa, Discover, Amex)
Month
Year
CVV
First name
Last name
Address line 1
Address line 2
City
Select a country dropdown
Zip code
Select a state/province dropdown
Phone number

AND A "Set as primary" checkbox should display
AND A Save button should display and be disabled
AND A Cancel button should displayed and be enabled

title: Clicking Cancel reverts any changes in the Add a card section
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Manage Subscriptions" page
AND The user expanded the Payment methods section
AND The user have less than 5 payment methods saved
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks the "Add a card" link
AND The user fills out the credit card fields
AND The user clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN The changes are reverted
AND The Save button is disabled
AND The "Add a card" form closes/collapses

title: Save button is enabled only when all required fields are filled in with valid data
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Manage Subscriptions" page
AND The user expanded the Payment methods section
AND The user have less than 5 payment methods saved
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks the "Add a card" link
AND The user fills out the "Add a card" fields
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button is enabled only when all required fields are filled in with valid data

Notes:
- "Address line 2" is an optional field
- State/province is only required if "United States" or "Canada" is selected as Country

title: "Select a state/province" field is enabled only if United States or Canada are selected as Country
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Manage Subscriptions" page
AND The user expanded the Payment methods section
AND The user have less than 5 payment methods saved
custom_steps:
WHEN The user clicks the "Add a card" link
AND The user selects "United States" or "Canada" in the "Select a country" dropdown
custom_expected: THEN The "Select a state/province" dropdown is enabled

title: Maximum of 5 payment methods allowed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user has 5 payment methods saved
custom_steps: WHEN The user views their payment methods in the Payment methods section of the "Manage Subscriptions" page
custom_expected:
THEN The "Add a card" link does not display
AND The message "Maximum of 5 payment methods allowed" displays

title: User can view All League Newsletters
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the "Email Newsletters" page
custom_expected:
THEN "All League Newsletters" that can be subscribed to displays:
MLB Morning Lineup
MLB.com Partners
MLB.com Insider
MLB Shop
MLB Auction
R.B.I. Baseball
All Star 5K Fun Run
Beat the Streak Alerts
MLB.com User Research
All-Star Newsletter
Boletín de LasMayores.com
MLB Europe
MLB.TV News
PLAYBALL
MLB FoodFest
MLB NYC Retail Store

title: User can view All Team Newsletters
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Email Newsletters" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user selects all the teams in the teams dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN User should be able to see the team newsletters for the teams they have selected
AND The team they have selected is removed from the teams dropdown list

title: User can remove all selected teams from All Teams Newsletter dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Email Newsletters" page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user selects multiple teams in the teams dropdown
AND The user clicks the selected teams dropdown bar "x" at the right
custom_expected:
THEN All selected teams are removed from selected teams bar/dropdown area
AND The team newsletters lists no longer display on the page
AND The previously selected teams display in the dropdown list again

title: User can remove single team from All Teams Newsletter dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Email Newsletters" page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user selects one or more teams in the teams dropdown
AND The user clicks the "x" that corresponds to a selected team
custom_expected:
THEN The corresponding team is removed from selected teams bar/dropdown area
AND The corresponding team's newsletters list no longer displays on the page
AND The corresponding team displays in the dropdown list again

title: User can view newsletters they have subscribed to
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user has subscribed to newsletters
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the "Email Newsletters" page
custom_expected: THEN On page load, the User should be able to see the email newsletters (both league and team newsletters) they are subscribed to

title: User can select and de-select newsletters
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN The user is viewing the "Email Newsletters" page
custom_expected: THEN The user should be able to select or de-select email newsletters

title: User can make updates to their email newsletter subscriptions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Email Newsletters" page
custom_steps: WHEN The user makes changes to their current email newsletter subscriptions
custom_expected:
THEN The Save button should be enabled
AND The user should be able to click the Save button
AND The updates remain if the user logs out, logs back in, and views the "Email Newsletters" page

title: Save button should be disabled and Cancel button should be enabled when user visits the Email Newsletters page without making changes (default state)
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN The user first visits the "Email Newsletters" page
custom_expected: THEN The Save button should be disabled and the Cancel button should be enabled

title: Save button should be disabled unless it detects a change
custom_preconds: GIVEN The user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN The user views the "Email Newsletters" page
custom_expected: THEN The Save button should be disabled unless it detects a change to the user's current newsletter subscriptions

title: Clicking Cancel reverts any changes in the All League/All Teams Newsletters sections
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user is viewing the "Email Newsletters" page
custom_steps:
WHEN The user makes changes to their current All League email newsletter subscriptions
AND The user makes change to their current All Teams email newsletter subscriptions
AND The user clicks Cancel
custom_expected:
THEN The changes are reverted
AND The Save button is disabled

title: Clicking "Unsubscribe From All" unsubscribes the user from newsletters immediately
custom_preconds:
GIVEN The user is logged in
AND The user has subscribed to newsletters
custom_steps:
WHEN The user views the "Email Newsletters" page
AND The user clicks the "Unsubscribe From All" button
custom_expected: THEN The user is unsubscribed from all newsletters that display on the Email Newsletters page
